Package Class

This package contains all classes for the Restaurant Reservation Program These package also contains the entities that the Main Class(Controller) intermediates with Entities such as Reservation, Promotion, Table, TableManager

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GenerateId
    An interface for generation of ID
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlaCarteItem
    Represent a Alacarte item in the restuarant.
    customScanner
    A helper class for Scanning user input from the console Generalized error message for invalid inputs from the user
    Delivery
    The program will have a new function called Order Delivery.
    Item
    Item parent class for AlaCarteItem and Promotion It implements serializable to allow us to serialize and deserialize to a file
    Main
    This is the main class It is a controller that communicates with boundaries(MainApp) and enitites(Ordering, MainMenu, Promotion and etc classes)
    MainMenu
    Represent a Main menu in the restuarant.
    OrderHistory
    This is a OrderHistory Class It represent the List of order record that the restaurant had.
    Ordering
    This is the Ordering class Any functions related to ordering at the restaurant (Adding, updating and removing an order) will happen here It implements serializable to allow us to serialize and deserialize to a file (After oder is paid for) It also implements the Generate Id interface to be able to generate a random id for the integer
    Promotion
    Represent a promotion in the restuarant.
    Reservation
    This is a reservation class.
    Staff
    This is a Staff class.
    Table
    This is a table class.
    TableManager
    TableManager Class that will managed the tables that the restaurant had It will perform function like free table, printing available tables and setting table to occupied
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Type
    A special class that represents a group of constants that classifies the menu item type, in this case, it is the type of item Mains, Sides, Drinks and Dessert

Package Class Description

This package contains all classes for the Restaurant Reservation Program These package also contains the entities that the Main Class(Controller) intermediates with Entities such as Reservation, Promotion, Table, TableManager
Since:
2019/04/01
Version:
9.0
Author:
Sam Jian Shen
